author: axic3354
content: It seems to be not entirely correct, it let someone add random files: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/4478

author: alita85
content:
I fixed the issue. For reference the source was that during my implementation of better error handling the bot would not mark things as failed which were not recognized as error types I defined. So that left a lot of wiggle room for there to be an error but not failure.

To fix this I added error handling and fixed the triggering bug. In addition I wrote tests to make sure this exact behavior doesn't happen again.
